title: Facile and Scalable Bilayer Polymer Encapsulation to Achieve Long-term Stability of Perovskite Solar Cells Under Harsh Humid Conditions
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01483E, Paper
Rohith Kumar Raman, Saraswathi Ganesan, Ananthan Alagumalai, Vidya Sudhakaran Menon, Suresh Krishnan, Sethilandavan A. Gurusamy Thangavelu, Ananthanarayanan Krishnamoorthy
Perovskite solar cell (PSC) technology has shown remarkable progress in the domains of power conversion efficiency (PCE) and cost-effective fabrication process but its poor environmental stability is a serious issue...
